mapper.update: UPDATE GT_A008_A SET ESB_YMD = #{esbYmd}, CSS_KND = #{cssKnd}, TYPE_CDE = #{typeCde}, FILE_NAM = #{fileNam}, UPT_YMD = SYSDATE, AREA = #{area}, CSS_NAM = #{cssNam}, PE_NAM = #{peNam}, GU_NAM = #{guNam}, DONG_NAM = #{dongNam}, SCH_NAM = #{schNam}, PE_CDE = #{peCde}, GU_CDE = #{guCde}, DONG_CDE = #{dongCde}, SCH_MGRNU = #{schMgrnu}, RI_NAM = #{liNam}, RI_CDE = #{liCde}, JIBUN = #{jibun}, PNU = #{pnu}, XCE = #{pointXce}, YCE = #{pointYce}, MAXX = #{maxX}, MAXY = #{maxY}, MINX = #{minX}, MINY = #{minY}, XGEO = MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom},5181) WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, TEMP.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALROWS FROM ( SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORKTM, WORKUSER, WORK_BG FROM GT_A008_A_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC ) TEMP ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC, MGRNU ASC) TEMP WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rows} * ( #{page} - 1 ) + 1 AND #{rows}* #{page}
